Name: Check instances health
Description: Checks if INSTANCE is in state "running" under a subnet with "OK" state.

Queries.ResultHeader: Is instance ${INSTANCE} running, and in an OK subnet?

Name: Internet can connect to instance
Description: Checks if INSTANCE can be accessed from the public internet

Queries.ResultHeader: Can ${INSTANCE} be accessed from the public internet?

Name: List OK instances
Description: Provides a list of all instances in state "running" under a subnet in "OK" state.

Queries.ResultHeader: These instances are in state "running" under a subnet in "OK" state

Name: Find instances by tag
Description: List all instances that have a specific tag

Name: Check VPC
Description: Checks whether VPC is in state 'available'.

Name: Internet can SSH to instance
Description: Checks if one can ssh to INSTANCE from the public internet

Queries.ResultHeader: Can you ssh to ${INSTANCE} from the public internet?

Name: Instances with open admin ports
Description: List any instances that have Admin ports (SSH or RDP) accessible from a point on the Internet

Queries.ResultHeader: These instances have SSH or RDP accessible from a point on the internet.
Queries.QueryString: list: instance-has-eni(Instance, Eni) && reachable-public-tcp-udp(dir/ingress, proto/6, Eni, Port, public-ip/8-8-8-8, port/40000) && (Port in {port/22, port/3389}).

Name: Instances with open port
Description: Lists any instances that have PORT open to the public internet

Queries.ResultHeader: These instances have port ${PORT} open to the public internet
Queries.QueryString: list: reachable-public-tcp-udp(dir/ingress, proto/6, Eni, ${PORT}, public-ip/8-8-8-8, port/40000).

Name: Instances with telnet open
Description: Looks for instances that have telnet accesible from the internet.

Queries.ResultHeader: These instances have telnet open to the public internet
Queries.QueryString: list: reachable-public-tcp-udp(dir/ingress, proto/6, Eni, port/23, public-ip/8-8-8-8, port/40000).

Name: Instances with FTP Open
Description: Looks for instances that have ftp accesible from the internet.

Queries.ResultHeader: These instances have ftp open to the public internet
Queries.QueryString: list: reachable-public-tcp-udp(dir/ingress, proto/6, Eni, port/21, public-ip/8-8-8-8, port/40000).

Name: 1-Hop Internet Accessibility
Description: For a list of instances that are not internet accessible, which internet-accessible instances can access them?

Queries.ResultHeader: These are internet-accessible instances that can access non-internet-accessible instances

Name: Check Only Bastions Internet Accessible
Description: Returns true if all instances tagged as 'Bastion' are Internet accessible, and if those are the ONLY instances that are internet accessible

Queries.ResultHeader: Are the only internet accessible instances tagged 'Bastion'?
Queries.QueryString: all Instance: instance-has-tag1(Instance, tag-key/Name, tag-value/Bastion) <=> internet-can-ssh-to-instance(Instance).
